text: Millionaires Mansions was a TV documentary produced by BAFTA-winning Indus Films and shown on British television Channel 4 in 2016. The documentary followed luxury interior design companies, such as Juliettes Interiors, when working on high-end projects for high net worth individuals and their homes. Category:Channel 4 original programming Category:2016 British television series debuts
title: Millionaires Mansions
